resources.string: App requires permission to lock the screen. Click here to grant that permission

The app will lock (most of) the screen, when you tilt your device for more then 45Â°. The screen will turn dark, to indicate that touch events are blocked. Rotate your device back in portrait mode to unlock the screen again.

Note: Not everything can be blocked - the status bar and on-screen navigation buttons are still accessable!

To disable the automatic screen lock, simply click on the apps notification.
